title: Biden rolls out ‘ethics plan’ after son resigns
text: Hunter Biden is now admitting that he made some mistakes as his father, Democratic Presidential candidate Joe Biden, introduces his new “ethics plan." RT America’s Faran Fronczak reports. Syria's Ministry of Defense has announced that the Syrian army has taken full control of the region of Manbij as heavy fighting continues along the Turkish border. Hong Kong Chief Executive Carrie Lam is announcing new initiatives ahead of her annual policy address and condemning some of the most recent violent attacks on police officers. RT America’s Michele Greenstein reports from Hong Kong. A Texas police officer who fatally shot a Black woman in her own home is finding himself on the other side of the law. RT America's Trinity Chavez has the details.
